title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press finish, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: Pressing finish in the JAR packager does not allow me to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. Instead, it shows an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors when I press finish, a dialog should pop up to allow me to save the files before proceeding with JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager.
2. Add some files to be included in the JAR.
3. Do not save any of the files.
4. Press the finish button to create the JAR.
5. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' instead of being able to create the JAR with unsaved editors.
